Developer Resources

Developer Resources

The following resources are available for Bing Maps iOS Control developers:

  • Bing Maps iOS Control Forum
  • Bing Maps on MSDN
  • Bing Maps Developer Blog
  • Apple iPhone Developer Center

Account Issues

If you are having issues creating a Bing Maps Account in the Bing Maps Account Center, getting a Bing Maps Key, or have an account access question, contact mpnet@microsoft.com.

Licensing Questions

If you are interested in finding out more about Bing Maps or have questions about licensing Bing Maps, email maplic@microsoft.com or go to http://www.microsoft.com/maps/resources/default.aspx.
